title.rendered: Wellsfargo partners with Smile Foundation for Healthcare Services

content.rendered:
Wells Fargo advancing healthcare with mobile units

In a significant partnership, Wells Fargo joined forces with Smile Foundation in 2022 to increase healthcare accessibility through four Mobile Health Units equipped with integrated telemedicine. These units are strategically placed across key cities: two in Bangalore, another in Chennai and the last one in Hyderabad.

This initiative focuses on providing specialised health services to underserved communities, combining the convenience of mobile healthcare with the efficiency of telemedicine. By bringing these advanced resources directly to the doorsteps of those in need, Wells Fargo and Smile Foundation are working together to make quality healthcare more accessible and effective for everyone in these regions.

Wellsfargo partners with Smile Foundation for Healthcare Services

In 2022-23, Wells Fargo partnered with Smile Foundation to establish four Mobile Health Units with integrated telemedicine capabilities, specifically catering to special health needs. This collaboration has proven to be immensely impactful, benefiting a total of 53,913 beneficiaries who received essential primary healthcare services. Additionally, the initiative facilitated 2,372 specialized teleconsultations, ensuring that individuals with specific health requirements received expert medical guidance and support. Wells Fargo’s commitment to empowering underserved communities through innovative healthcare solutions has made a significant difference in the lives of those in need.
